Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
12.11.2014 SH SCR19322 Added update INVS_SFIP_REFERENCE = SFIP_REFERENCE
25.06.2014 GB SCR18986 Removed test Only if SBUY_PPAHANDLING = 0 for update SFIP_REFERENCE
24.04.2014 SH SCR18854 Removed test "SFIP_BENEFICIARYCODE = ING or FI" to update SFIP_REFERENCE
29.12.2013 GB SCR18605 Rem. range SFEX_PAYABLENUMBER=SFIN_PAYABLENUMBER from task which get SFIN_INVO_NO=Max(SFEX_SCHI_INVO_NO)
21.03.2013 SH SCR18000 Changed <scf:buyerCode> to <scf:buyerRef> (read tag from XML) and added update
SFIP_BUYERSENTITYCODE = <scf:buyerEntityRef>
23.01.2013 SH SCR17875 Extended test to update SFIP_REFERENCE with SBUY_PPAHANDLING = 0
03.04.2012 SH SCR17149 Removed '_D' from public name
06.02.2012 SH SCR17092 Added new SCFH fields for update
14.12.2011 SH SCR16970 Added UFB595 to store SFCO_CONTENT
16.11.2011 SH SCR16836 Added new SFEX fields (SCF Russia) and
changed File2Blb to File2BlbKeepBOM where SFCO is stored
06.12.2010 SH SCR16043 Extended test to update SFIP_REFERENCE
18.11.2010 SH SCR15994 Added SFIP_REFERENCE
27.08.2010 SH SCR15755 Changed logic of program to be able to handle mult
payments per file as well as a file without any payments
-- Pre-defined element groups
-- Initializations
... without trailing '/', the index 1-999 has to be added
-- In case of no errors and the incoming XML file is converted,
submit BSF406 to futher handle the file
@ Task use direct access to XML file
... also files from Demica are rerceived without an <scf:Payments> group, in
this case an empty SFIP (payment) row must be added
-- Set administration and client number (via table SBUY)
... starts after first '__' until '_'
... store to variables for further use where SFIP is stored
-- used to store the invoices
